text: Hairy sedge is a common name for the plant Carex hirta, native to Europe. Hairy sedge may also refer to: *Carex comans, native to New Zealand *Carex hirta, native to Europe *Carex hirtifolia, native to north-eastern North America *Carex lacustris, native to North America *Carex pilosa, native to temperate Eurasia
title: List of plants known as hairy sedge
